name: LOWREZ-FISHER
description:
A submission for the LOWREZJAM. Fishing is simple. Cast the rod, catch the fish, make the food or sell the goods. Explore the different fishing locations and earn your off-grid living, in the future.

To Play:

1. Navigate to the fishing rod inside the available town, then press on it.

2. All the actions are done with the fishing button on the bottom-right corner.

3. Press to cast rod, catch fish (when fish appears), store the caught fish, and cast again.

4. If you miss your time to fish, re-cast the rod to reload the bait. (Totally not hard coded to reset the fishing timer or anything like that)

Code [Godot] and Art [Aseprite] by me

Music from "interfaceanditemsounds", Humble Bundle Music&SoundFX pack

GitHub Repo: https://github.com/Touff-97/LOWREZ-FISHER.git
